name: The Witcher: Enhanced Edition
version: Rise of the White Wolf Mod
description: Requires game files from GOG. Download here: 1 of 4, 2 of 4, 3 of 4, 4 of 4 Also requires the Rise of the White Wolf mod downloaded from moddb or Nexus Mods. This installer requires the .exe, NOT the .zip file.
notes: The game installer will have several errors upon completion. Exit the game's installer and the mod will install next. You will have to point the installer to your Witcher directory.

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows setup exe file downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows setup exe file downloaded from GOG
- mod: N/A:Select the Mod installer exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher Enhanced Edition/launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_35
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: CheckFloatConstants
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: enabled
- execute:
    command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher Enhanced Edition/backup/System"
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher Enhanced Edition/backup
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher Enhanced Edition/Launcher
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher Enhanced Edition/backup/System
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher Enhanced Edition/System/witcher.exe
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher Enhanced Edition/backup
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher Enhanced Edition/launcher.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: mod
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
